response.overview: Bhadrinath was a famous artist. His paintings earned a good name for him. His model & artist monalisa stays with him, in his bunglow (villa). Anto was Bhadrinath’s jeep driver. Badrinath hired him because he was a good & strong security man for his bunglow. Jagan was a press reporter cum photographer. He attends Bhadrinath’s exhibition of paintings show & also tries to take interview of Bhadrinath. But Bhadrinath gets upset & angry with jagan. Jani a friend of jagan’s sends jagan to his uncle chalko’s house. Chalko and jagan go to Bhadrinath’s house to meet him. But badrinath’s bunglow watchman confronts & stops’s them. One day jagan meets monalisa. Both get instantly attracted to each other. One day jagan had gone to badrinath’s bunglow to meet monalisa. But badrinath saw them & confronts jagan & throws him near the mountain side. jagan and badrinath get into a fight and at last bhadrinath falls down & dies. So jagan and monalisa were able to re-unite happily.
response.title: Haseen Monaliza
